Text: if the sample on the A.C.l. site is anything to go by this looks awesome, so could any body please open this little beauty up and seed for a while there are six of us waiting patiently, i'll let it run for weeks then, anything to spread the mcmurtry word! , thanks in anticipation.....
Can anybody put this back up ... huge McMurtry fan stuck at 90% here. I will seed for at least a week if I can finish it ! Too long in the wasteland ...
